name: Plumber 3D. - 0.3.3
description:
Classical plumber, only in 3D.

- 300+ levels
- Multilevel interlacing of pipes
- Constant increase in complexity

Try out your spatial thinking in this puzzle. 


10 new levels every day, until reaching at least 350.  Next update is on  8-9/06/17

0.3.1:

  • Fixed bugs leading to crash.
  • Improved perfomance.
  • Updated graphics.
  • New levels in a day.
